Contact the PNSQC team

We are here to help with registration, proposals, sponsorship, and volunteer opportunities.

General inquiries

Reach out with questions about conference logistics, registration changes, accessibility, or community partnerships.

  • Email · info@pnsqc.org
  • Volunteer team · volunteer@pnsqc.org
  • Sponsorships · sponsors@pnsqc.org

Stay connected

Subscribe to announcements about registration, schedules, and speaker updates.

Join the mailing list

Frequently asked questions

How do I register a team?

Group registration packages are available with discounted pricing for teams of five or more.

Are sessions recorded?

Yes. Registered attendees receive on-demand access to session recordings after the event.

Can I volunteer?

Volunteers receive complimentary access and help with onsite logistics and community support.

Looking for a specific committee or speaker contact? Let us know and we will connect you with the right team.
PNSQC

Pacific Northwest Software Quality Conference

Connecting the software quality community since 1983.
